body_html:
Indeed, that looks good. Did you test it, does it work for you? Would you care to make a PR with this change? I'm thinking that you might also need to change the betas in adam.py (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/adam.py#L111).

Does it work for you?

body:
Indeed, that looks good. Did you test it, does it work for you? Would you care to make a PR with this change? I'm thinking that you might also need to change the betas in adam.py (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/adam.py#L111).

Does it work for you?
